title: Spacious 2-Bedroom for Rent!
map_address: 22250 Swan St near 9 Mile Rd & Pontiac Trail
posting_body: Brookdale Apartments is located in Downtown South Lyon which is known for its historic charm, top-notch parks and excellent schools.
Our community offers spacious and charming one and two bedroom apartment homes.
Residents at Brookdale Apartments value our complimentary concierge services, dedicated maintenance team, and first-class amenities.
We value our residents and take pride in our community!

Carport FREE with every apartment home, Large private balconies, Full kitchen, dishwasher and garbage disposal, Laundry center located inside each building (2nd floor)Ceiling fan in dining room, Central air/heat, Blinds throughout apartment home, AT&T U-Verse available, Pets welcomed of all sizes (breed restrictions)24-hour fitness center, Refreshing outdoor swimming pool, Picnic area with grills, Resident garden plots, Concierge services, Downtown Ann Arbor is only a 17-mile drive via a quick and easy access to US 23, Local colleges Washtenaw Community, Cleary College and University of Michigan, Nearby banks Comerica, Citizens, Chase, Bank of America, Charter One and many more, Busch's, Kroger's less than a mile, Twelve Oaks Mall Novi is less than 20 mins.
Two bedroom apartment homes boast 865 square feet with a separate dining room, a kitchen with plenty of counter space and all the appliances included with updated oak kitchen cabinets!
Two bedrooms also offer a large walk-in pantry attached to your kitchen.
Every apartment home comes with a covered carport; offers updated central heat and air, blinds throughout and private balconies on the 2nd and 3rd floors.
All apartment homes are also newly and fully renovated!
- Other amenities - Concierge Services - WIFI Access in Clubhouse - Community Garden
- Other appliances - Laundry Facilities in every building
- Other lease lengths - We offer anywhere from 2-month leasing, all the way through 15-months!
- Small Dogs Allowed - Breed restrictions apply
- Other pet policies - $100 Non-Refundable Pet Fee (per pet).
Monthly Pet Fee $30 Per Month Per Pet - Up to 2 pets
- Other utilities - Trash Pick Up Included
